title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

description.title: The description schema
description.description: A description of the configuration file
examples: a clarinet with vocal tract and ranges for parameters

version.title: Program version
version.description: The version of the program/ schema that the json file applies to

simulation.title: General simulation properties
simulation.description: Properties relating to the entire simulation

sample rate.title: Sample rate
sample rate.description: Samples per second to be calculated

callback every.title: Number of samples before callback
callback every.description: The number of samples between calls to the callback function. Remove if callback not used

environment.title: Generic physical properties
environment.description: Physical properties that affect the entire simulation

acoustic.title: acoustic properties
acoustic.description: Properties of the acoustic environment. These can be replaced by physical properties from which acoustic properties are calculated

_prefer.title: Acoustics override
_prefer.description: Whether these properties are preferred over the physical properties

speed of sound.title: Speed of sound
speed of sound.description: The speed of sound in m/s

density.title: Air density
density.description: The density of the air in kg/m3

viscosity.title: Air viscosity
viscosity.description: The viscosity of the air in SI units

physical.title: Physical properties
physical.description: Physical properties of the environment from which acoustic properties can be calculated

atmospheric pressure.title: Atmospheric pressure
atmospheric pressure.description: Atmospheric pressure of the air in Pa

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Temperature in degree C. Remember a clarinet is played by a human!

humidity.title: Relative humidity
humidity.description: Relative humidity of the air in %

blowing pressure.title: Blowing pressure
blowing pressure.description: Multiple parameters relating to the control of the blowing pressure. Blowing pressure is 'value' from start if ramp is not enabled

value.title: Value of the blowing pressure at end of ramp
value.description: Value of the blowing pressure at end of ramp

ramp duration.title: Duration of ramp
ramp duration.description: Duration of ramp. If ramp is linear the blowing pressure will have the constant value after this time. For exponential ramps this value is the time constant

ramp type.title: ramp type
ramp type.description: Ramp type to use for blowing pressure increase

ramp enabled.title: Enable ramp
ramp enabled.description: Whether to use ramp or depart from final value (if false)

reed.title: Reed properties
reed.description: Properties of the reed reed moves instantaneously if 'dynamic' is false, that means res. freq and q are not taken into account

stiffness.title: Reed stiffness
stiffness.description: Stiffness of the reed in Pa/m

resonance frequency.title: Resonance frequency
resonance frequency.description: The resonance frequency of the reed in Hz
